title: Drone Photogrammetry
description: Researched and put together a proposal to construct a drone; received a $1000 grant from the School of Engineering

title: Genetic Salesman
description: Implemented a genetic algorithm to solve the traveling salesman problem; wrote an overview paper discussing NP-Hardness, sampling with bias and parameter tuning

title: Tag Track
description: Wrote a suggestions and issues tracker for Telegram's bug testing program, synced with Trello and used by over 10K testers and developers
